alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 22 at 9:40PM MDT until September 22 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Northeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 1030 PM MDT. * At 940 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Rawhide Buttes to near Grayrocks Reservoir, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Guernsey, Fort Laramie, Jay Em, Fort Laramie National Historic Site, Grayrocks Reservoir, Guernsey Campground, Rawhide Buttes, Hartville and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
